testCase.name: FileUploader component successful file upload
FileUploader component accepts only PDF files for upload
FileUploader component displays an error for files larger than max size
FileUploader component handles multiple file uploads
FileUploader component displays an error when too many files are uploaded
FileCard renders file information correctly
FileCard renders the correct file icon based on file type
FileCard renders icons for different file types
FileCard renders menu items when action handlers are provided
FileCard does not render menu when no action handlers are provided
FileCard shows only specific menu items based on provided handlers
FileCard calls handlers when menu items are clicked
FileCard calls onRetryUpload when retry button is clicked
FileCard renders progress bar when status is Uploading
FileCard displays different message styles based on file status
FileCard applies correct status class to the file card
FileCard handles missing file properties gracefully
FileCard generates a unique ID if none is provided
FileCard uses provided ID if one is passed
FileCard renders metaData when provided
FileContext provides the correct initial state
FileContext adds a file correctly
FileContext updates file status correctly
FileContext updates file progress correctly
FileContext shows and clears status message correctly
FileContext deletes a file correctly
FileContext clears all files correctly
StatusMessage renders correctly with success props
StatusMessage renders correctly with error props
StatusMessage calls onDismiss when dismiss button is clicked
StatusMessage has correct accessibility attributes
StatusMessageDisplay renders nothing when statusMessage is null
StatusMessageDisplay renders StatusMessage when statusMessage is provided
StatusMessageDisplay passes clearStatusMessage as onDismiss prop to StatusMessage
